#PCA for wine

```{r}
#set the working directory
setwd("C:/Users/Nathan/Desktop/DS110")
dir()

#Read the wineTrain dataset, note that it is comma seperated
wine=read.table("WineTrain.txt", sep=",", header=T)
head(wine)

summary(wine)
colnames(wine)

#we are ready to apply the pca to reduce the number of variables that can provide the maximum variability in the dataset

winePCA=prcomp(wine, scale=TRUE, center=TRUE)

#we can show different outputs of PCA
winePCA

#Let's show  the summary of PCA
summary(winePCA)

#lets create the "screeplot":the plot of number of principal components on the x axis and the variance of each principal component on y-axis

plot(winePCA,type="1",pch=16)



```
